batch_role: DTOs and entities for managing programming problems in a coding platform.
key_features: Encapsulates problem details, including ID, platform type, problem number, title, difficulty type, and links.
Supports pagination and sorting for problem listings.
Defines difficulty levels and types for problems.
Maps data from entities to structured response formats.
project_hints: The project involves a platform for managing and categorizing programming problems, likely for educational or competitive purposes.
Entities and DTOs suggest a focus on user interactions, submissions, and difficulty ratings.
